name: VerID:WAP1.0.0.1|ReqID:13456.0|Author:chenguosen|CaseTitle:01.账户信息、对应基础账本科目都不存在_用户、客户、账户、账本、账本科目创建成功
description: 提供账户中心的账户开户，并根据参数提供的产品线和合同编码，自动创建对应账本科目、“产品线+合同编码”与账本科目对应关系、账户账本等功能。开户成功后返回账户ID给调用方。

steps.name: 测试步骤1：准备reqParam信息内容
测试步骤2：准备测试用例请求报文

attachments.name: 准备测试用例请求报文

steps.name: 测试步骤3：向服务器发送请求并获取响应消息
测试步骤4：响应消息内容断言

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: '01.账户信息、对应基础账本科目都不存在_用户、客户、账户、账本、账本科目创建成功'

parameters.name: db_assert
parameters.value: '1|SELECT count(*) FROM BAC_USER WHERE USERID ='900002'||1|SELECT count(*) FROM BAC_BUSINESS_ACCTSUBJECT_REL WHERE CONTRACTID ='9000000000000200002'||4|SELECT count(*) FROM BAC_ACCOUNT_SUBJECT WHERE ACCTSUBJECTID IN (SELECT ACCTSUBJECTID FROM BAC_ACCOUNT_SUBJECT_DATA WHERE ACCTID IN (SELECT ACCTID FROM BAC_ACCOUNT WHERE userid='900002'))'

parameters.name: redis_assert
parameters.value: 'BAC_custom_idEntityNumber_100000002|SELECT customId,customName,customType,identityNumber FROM BAC_CUSTOM WHERE CUSTOMID IN (SELECT CUSTOMID FROM BAC_USER WHERE USERID ='900002')||BAC_user_userId_900002|SELECT acctStatus,TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(createTime) - TO_DATE('1970-01-01 8:0:0', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 86400000 AS createTime,customId,innerUserId,userEmail,userId,userMobile,userName,userSource,userType FROM BAC_USER WHERE USERID ='900002''

labels.name: story
labels.value: BDC项目-账户开户请求接口正常流功能测试
